ps1.5:1.4: Sunnato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appanihito vimokkho—
ps1.5:2.2: sunnato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appanihito vimokkho;
ps1.5:2.3: ajjhattavutthano vimokkho, bahiddhavutthano vimokkho, dubhato vutthano vimokkho;
ps1.5:2.4: ajjhattavutthana cattaro vimokkha, bahiddhavutthana cattaro vimokkha, dubhato vutthana cattaro vimokkha;
ps1.5:2.5: ajjhattavutthananam anuloma cattaro vimokkha, bahiddhavutthananam anuloma cattaro vimokkha, dubhato vutthananam anuloma cattaro vimokkha;
ps1.5:2.6: ajjhattavutthanapatippassaddhi cattaro vimokkha, bahiddhavutthanapatippassaddhi cattaro vimokkha, dubhato vutthanapatippassaddhi cattaro vimokkha;
ps1.5:2.7: rupi rupani passatiti vimokkho, ajjhattam arupasanni bahiddha rupani passatiti vimokkho, subham teva adhimutto hotiti vimokkho;
ps1.5:2.8: akasanancayatanasamapatti vimokkho, vinnanancayatanasamapatti vimokkho, akincannayatanasamapatti vimokkho;
ps1.5:2.16: niramisaniramisataro vimokkho, panihito vimokkho, appanihito vimokkho, panihitappatippassaddhi vimokkho;
ps1.5:3.2: Idha bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va iti patisancikkhati—
ps1.5:4.2: Idha bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va iti patisancikkhati—
ps1.5:5.2: Idha bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va iti patisancikkhati—
ps1.5:9.2: Sotapattimaggo sakkayaditthivicikicchasilabbataparamasa ditthanusaya vicikicchanusaya vutthati, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vutthati, bahiddha ca sabbanimittehi vutthati.
ps1.5:9.3: Sakadagamimaggo olarika kamaragasannojana patighasannojana olarika kamaraganusaya patighanusaya vutthati, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vutthati, bahiddha ca sabbanimittehi vutthati.
ps1.5:9.4: Anagamimaggo anusahagata kamaragasannojana patighasannojana anusahagata kamaraganusaya patighanusaya vutthati, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vutthati, bahiddha ca sabbanimittehi vutthati.
ps1.5:9.5: Arahattamaggo ruparaga aruparaga mana uddhacca avijjaya mananusaya bhavaraganusaya avijjanusaya vutthati, tadanuvattakakilesehi ca khandhehi ca vutthati, bahiddha ca sabbanimittehi vutthati.
ps1.5:10.2: Pathamam jhanam patilabhatthaya vitakko ca vicaro ca piti ca sukhanca cittekaggata ca, dutiyam jhanam patilabhatthaya …pe…
ps1.5:10.4: catuttham jhanam patilabhatthaya vitakko ca vicaro ca piti ca sukhanca cittekaggata ca—
ps1.5:11.2: Akasanancayatanasamapattim patilabhatthaya vitakko ca vicaro ca piti ca sukhanca cittekaggata ca, vinnanancayatanasamapattim …pe…
ps1.5:11.4: nevasannanasannayatanasamapattim patilabhatthaya vitakko ca vicaro ca piti ca sukhanca cittekaggata ca—
ps1.5:12.6: ime dubhato vutthananam anuloma cattaro vimokkha.
ps1.5:13.2: Pathamassa jhanassa patilabho va vipako va, dutiyassa jhanassa …pe…
ps1.5:13.4: catutthassa jhanassa patilabho va vipako va—
ps1.5:14.2: Akasanancayatanasamapattiya patilabho va vipako va, vinnanancayatanasamapattiya …pe…
ps1.5:15.2: Sotapattimaggassa sotapattiphalam, sakadagamimaggassa sakadagamiphalam, anagamimaggassa anagamiphalam, arahattamaggassa arahattaphalam—
ps1.5:16.2: Idhekacco ajjhattam paccattam nilanimittam manasikaroti, nilasannam patilabhati.
ps1.5:16.3: So tam nimittam suggahitam karoti, supadharitam upadhareti, svavatthitam avatthapeti.
ps1.5:16.4: So tam nimittam suggahitam katva supadharitam upadharetva svavatthitam avatthapetva bahiddha nilanimitte cittam upasamharati, nilasannam patilabhati.
ps1.5:16.5: So tam nimittam suggahitam karoti, supadharitam upadhareti, svavatthitam avatthapeti.
ps1.5:16.6: So tam nimittam suggahitam katva upadharetva svavatthitam avatthapetva asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
ps1.5:16.8: “ajjhattanca bahiddha ca ubhayamidam rupan”ti, rupasanni hoti.
ps1.5:16.12: So tam nimittam suggahitam karoti, supadharitam upadhareti, svavatthitam avatthapeti.
ps1.5:16.13: So tam nimittam suggahitam katva supadharitam upadharetva svavatthitam avatthapetva bahiddha odatanimitte cittam upasamharati, odatasannam patilabhati.
ps1.5:16.14: So tam nimittam suggahitam karoti, supadharitam upadhareti, svavatthitam avatthapeti.
ps1.5:16.15: So tam nimittam suggahitam katva supadharitam upadharetva svavatthitam avatthapetva asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
ps1.5:16.17: “ajjhattanca bahiddha ca ubhayamidam rupan”ti, rupasanni hoti.
ps1.5:17.2: Idhekacco ajjhattam paccattam nilanimittam na manasikaroti, nilasannam na patilabhati;
ps1.5:17.3: bahiddha nilanimitte cittam upasamharati, nilasannam patilabhati.
ps1.5:17.4: So tam nimittam suggahitam karoti, supadharitam upadhareti, svavatthitam avatthapeti.
ps1.5:17.5: So tam nimittam suggahitam katva supadharitam upadharetva svavatthitam avatthapetva asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
ps1.5:17.10: odatanimittam na manasikaroti, odatasannam na patilabhati;
ps1.5:17.11: bahiddha odatanimitte cittam upasamharati, odatasannam patilabhati.
ps1.5:17.12: So tam nimittam suggahitam karoti, supadharitam upadhareti, svavatthitam avatthapeti.
ps1.5:17.13: So tam nimittam suggahitam katva supadharitam upadharetva svavatthitam avatthapetva asevati bhaveti bahulikaroti.
ps1.5:17.16: Evam ajjhattam arupasanni bahiddha rupani passatiti—
ps1.5:18.2: Idha bhikkhu mettasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharati, tatha dutiyam, tatha tatiyam, tatha catuttham. Iti uddhamadho tiriyam sabbadhi sabbattataya sabbavantam lokam mettasahagatena cetasa vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena pharitva viharati.
ps1.5:18.8: Upekkhasahagatena cetasa ekam disam pharitva viharati …pe…
ps1.5:19.2: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso rupasannanam samatikkama patighasannanam atthangama nanattasannanam amanasikara “ananto akaso”ti akasanancayatanam upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:20.2: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso akasanancayatanam samatikkamma “anantam vinnanan”ti vinnanancayatanam upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:21.2: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso vinnanancayatanam samatikkamma “natthi kinci”ti akincannayatanam upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:22.2: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso akincannayatanam samatikkamma nevasannanasannayatanam upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:23.2: Idha bhikkhu sabbaso nevasannanasannayatanam samatikkamma sannavedayitanirodham upasampajja viharati—
ps1.5:24.2: Cattari ca jhanani catasso ca arupasamapattiyo—
ps1.5:25.2: Cattaro ca ariyamagga, cattari ca samannaphalani, nibbananca—
ps1.5:26.2: Cattari ca jhanani, catasso ca arupasamapattiyo—
ps1.5:27.2: Cattaro ca ariyamagga, cattari ca samannaphalani, nibbananca—
ps1.5:28.2: Cattari ca jhanani, catasso ca arupasamapattiyo—
ps1.5:29.2: Cattaro ca ariyamagga, cattari ca samannaphalani, nibbananca—
ps1.5:30.2: Cattari ca jhanani, catasso ca arupasamapattiyo—
ps1.5:31.2: Cattaro ca ariyamagga, cattari ca samannaphalani, nibbananca—
ps1.5:32.2: Cattari ca jhanani, catasso ca arupasamapattiyo—
ps1.5:33.2: Cattaro ca ariyamagga, cattari ca samannaphalani, nibbananca—
ps1.5:36.2: Cattaro ca ariyamagga, cattari ca samannaphalani, nibbananca—
ps1.5:37.2: Cattari ca jhanani, catasso ca arupasamapattiyo—
ps1.5:37.5: Cattaro ca ariyamagga, cattari ca samannaphalani, nibbananca—
ps1.5:38.2: Pathamassa jhanassa patilabho va vipako va …pe…
ps1.5:39.2: Cattari ca jhanani, catasso ca arupasamapattiyo—
ps1.5:40.2: Cattaro ca ariyamagga, cattari ca samannaphalani, nibbananca—
ps1.5:41.2: Cattaro ca ariyamagga, cattari ca samannaphalani, nibbananca—
ps1.5:42.2: Cattari ca jhanani, catasso ca arupasamapattiyo—
ps1.5:43.2: Siya eko sannavimokkho dasa sannavimokkha honti, dasa sannavimokkha eko sannavimokkho hoti, vatthuvasena pariyayena.
ps1.5:44.22: Evam siya eko sannavimokkho dasa sannavimokkha honti, dasa sannavimokkha eko sannavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena.
ps1.5:45.5: Evam siya eko sannavimokkho dasa sannavimokkha honti, dasa sannavimokkha eko sannavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena.
ps1.5:46.10: Evam siya, eko sannavimokkho dasa sannavimokkha honti, dasa sannavimokkha eko sannavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena—
ps1.5:47.2: Siya eko nanavimokkho dasa nanavimokkha honti, dasa nanavimokkha eko nanavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena siyati.
ps1.5:47.4: Aniccanupassana yathabhutam nanam niccato sammoha annana muccatiti—
ps1.5:47.6: Dukkhanupassana yathabhutam nanam sukhato sammoha annana muccatiti—
ps1.5:47.8: Anattanupassana yathabhutam nanam attato sammoha annana muccatiti—
ps1.5:47.10: Nibbidanupassana yathabhutam nanam nandiya sammoha annana muccatiti—
ps1.5:47.12: Viraganupassana yathabhutam nanam ragato sammoha annana muccatiti—
ps1.5:47.14: Nirodhanupassana yathabhutam nanam samudayato sammoha annana muccatiti—
ps1.5:47.16: Patinissagganupassana yathabhutam nanam adanato sammoha annana muccatiti—
ps1.5:47.18: Animittanupassana yathabhutam nanam nimittato sammoha annana muccatiti—
ps1.5:47.20: Appanihitanupassana yathabhutam nanam panidhiya sammoha annana muccatiti—
ps1.5:47.22: Sunnatanupassana yathabhutam nanam abhinivesato sammoha annana muccatiti—
ps1.5:47.24: Evam siya eko nanavimokkho dasa nanavimokkha honti, dasa nanavimokkha eko nanavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena.
ps1.5:48.1: Rupe aniccanupassana yathabhutam nanam niccato sammoha annana muccatiti—
ps1.5:48.3: rupe sunnatanupassana yathabhutam nanam abhinivesato sammoha annana muccatiti—
ps1.5:48.5: Evam siya eko nanavimokkho dasa nanavimokkha honti, dasa nanavimokkha eko nanavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena.
ps1.5:49.6: jaramarane aniccanupassana yathabhutam nanam niccato sammoha annana muccatiti—
ps1.5:49.8: jaramarane sunnatanupassana yathabhutam nanam abhinivesato sammoha annana muccatiti—
ps1.5:49.10: Evam siya eko nanavimokkho dasa nanavimokkha honti, dasa nanavimokkha eko nanavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena—
ps1.5:50.2: Siya eko sitisiyavimokkho dasa sitisiyavimokkha honti, dasa sitisiyavimokkha eko sitisiyavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena siyati.
ps1.5:50.4: Aniccanupassana anuttaram sitibhavananam niccato santapaparilahadaratha muccatiti—
ps1.5:50.6: Dukkhanupassana anuttaram sitibhavananam sukhato santapaparilahadaratha muccatiti—
ps1.5:50.8: Anattanupassana anuttaram sitibhavananam attato santapaparilahadaratha muccatiti—
ps1.5:50.10: Nibbidanupassana anuttaram sitibhavananam nandiya santapaparilahadaratha muccatiti—
ps1.5:50.12: Viraganupassana anuttaram sitibhavananam ragato santapaparilahadaratha muccatiti—
ps1.5:50.14: Nirodhanupassana anuttaram sitibhavananam samudayato santapaparilahadaratha muccatiti—
ps1.5:50.16: Patinissagganupassana anuttaram sitibhavananam adanato santapaparilahadaratha muccatiti—
ps1.5:50.18: Animittanupassana anuttaram sitibhavananam nimittato santapaparilahadaratha muccatiti—
ps1.5:50.20: Appanihitanupassana anuttaram sitibhavananam panidhiya santapaparilahadaratha muccatiti—
ps1.5:50.22: Sunnatanupassana anuttaram sitibhavananam abhinivesato santapaparilahadaratha muccatiti—
ps1.5:50.24: Evam siya eko sitisiyavimokkho dasa sitisiyavimokkha honti, dasa sitisiyavimokkha eko sitisiyavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena.
ps1.5:51.1: Rupe aniccanupassana anuttaram sitibhavananam niccato santapaparilahadaratha muccatiti—
ps1.5:51.3: rupe sunnatanupassana anuttaram sitibhavananam abhinivesato santapaparilahadaratha muccatiti—
ps1.5:51.5: Evam siya eko sitisiyavimokkho dasa sitisiyavimokkha honti, dasa sitisiyavimokkha eko sitisiyavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena.
ps1.5:52.6: jaramarane aniccanupassana anuttaram sitibhavananam niccato santapaparilahadaratha muccatiti—
ps1.5:52.8: jaramarane sunnatanupassana anuttaram sitibhavananam abhinivesato santapaparilahadaratha muccatiti—
ps1.5:52.10: Evam siya eko sitisiyavimokkho dasa sitisiyavimokkha honti, dasa sitisiyavimokkha eko sitisiyavimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena—
ps1.5:53.34: Jhate ca jhape ca janatiti—jhanavimokkho—ayam jhanavimokkho.
ps1.5:54.2: Siya eko anupadacittassa vimokkho dasa anupadacittassa vimokkha honti, dasa anupadacittassa vimokkha eko anupadacittassa vimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena siyati.
ps1.5:54.24: Evam siya eko anupadacittassa vimokkho dasa anupadacittassa vimokkha honti, dasa anupadacittassa vimokkha eko anupadacittassa vimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena.
ps1.5:55.5: Evam siya eko anupadacittassa vimokkho dasa anupadacittassa vimokkha honti, dasa anupadacittassa vimokkha eko anupadacittassa vimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena.
ps1.5:56.10: Evam siya eko anupadacittassa vimokkho dasa anupadacittassa vimokkha honti, dasa anupadacittassa vimokkha eko anupadacittassa vimokkho hoti vatthuvasena pariyayena.
ps1.5:60.1: Yanca aniccanupassanananam, yanca anattanupassanananam, yanca animittanupassanananam, yanca sunnatanupassanananam—
ps1.5:60.4: Yanca dukkhanupassanananam, yam ca nibbidanupassanananam, yanca viraganupassanananam, yanca appanihitanupassanananam—
ps1.5:61.1: Tini kho panimani vimokkhamukhani lokaniyyanaya samvattanti.
ps1.5:61.2: Sabbasankhare paricchedaparivatumato samanupassanataya animittaya ca dhatuya cittasampakkhandanataya, sabbasankharesu manosamuttejanataya appanihitaya ca dhatuya cittasampakkhandanataya, sabbadhamme parato samanupassanataya sunnataya ca dhatuya cittasampakkhandanataya—
ps1.5:62.4: Aniccato manasikaroto khayato sankhara upatthanti, dukkhato manasikaroto bhayato sankhara upatthanti, anattato manasikaroto sunnato sankhara upatthanti.
ps1.5:63.1: Aniccato manasikaroto kim bahulam cittam hoti?
ps1.5:63.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto kim bahulam cittam hoti?
ps1.5:63.3: Anattato manasikaroto kim bahulam cittam hoti?
ps1.5:65.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa katamindriyam adhipateyyam hoti, bhavanaya katindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, kenatthena bhavana, ko bhaveti?
ps1.5:65.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa katamindriyam adhipateyyam hoti, bhavanaya katindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, kenatthena bhavana, ko bhaveti?
ps1.5:65.3: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa katamindriyam adhipateyyam hoti, bhavanaya katindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, kenatthena bhavana, ko bhaveti?
ps1.5:65.4: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa saddhindriyam adhipateyyam hoti.
ps1.5:65.5: Bhavanaya cattarindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti.
ps1.5:65.9: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa samadhindriyam adhipateyyam hoti.
ps1.5:65.10: Bhavanaya cattarindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti.
ps1.5:65.14: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa pannindriyam adhipateyyam hoti.
ps1.5:65.15: Bhavanaya cattarindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti.
ps1.5:66.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa katamindriyam adhipateyyam hoti?
ps1.5:66.2: Bhavanaya katindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti?
ps1.5:66.4: Pativedhaya katindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti?
ps1.5:66.7: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa katamindriyam adhipateyyam hoti?
ps1.5:66.8: Bhavanaya katindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti?
ps1.5:66.10: Pativedhaya katindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti?
ps1.5:66.13: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa katamindriyam adhipateyyam hoti?
ps1.5:66.14: Bhavanaya katindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti?
ps1.5:66.16: Pativedhaya katindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti?
ps1.5:67.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa saddhindriyam adhipateyyam hoti.
ps1.5:67.2: Bhavanaya cattarindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.5:67.4: Pativedhaya cattarindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti.
ps1.5:67.8: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa samadhindriyam adhipateyyam hoti.
ps1.5:67.9: Bhavanaya cattarindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.5:67.11: Pativedhaya cattarindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti.
ps1.5:67.15: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa pannindriyam adhipateyyam hoti.
ps1.5:67.16: Bhavanaya cattarindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.5:67.18: Pativedhaya cattarindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti.
ps1.5:70.9: Jhanaphassam pathamam phusati, paccha nirodham nibbanam sacchikarotiti—
ps1.5:70.11: “Dukkha sankhara, sukho nirodho”ti natam hoti dittham viditam sacchikatam phassitam pannayati—
ps1.5:70.13: Yo cayam puggalo saddhavimutto, yo ca kayasakkhi, yo ca ditthippatto, siya ime tayo puggala saddhavimuttapi kayasakkhipi ditthippattapi vatthuvasena pariyayena siyati.
ps1.5:70.21: Evam ime tayo puggala saddhindriyassa vasena saddhavimutta.
ps1.5:71.7: Evam ime tayo puggala samadhindriyassa vasena kayasakkhi.
ps1.5:72.7: Evam ime tayo puggala pannindriyassa vasena ditthippatta.
ps1.5:73.1: Yo cayam puggalo saddhavimutto, yo ca kayasakkhi, yo ca ditthippatto, evam siya ime tayo puggala saddhavimuttapi kayasakkhipi ditthippattapi vatthuvasena pariyayena.
ps1.5:73.2: Yo cayam puggalo saddhavimutto, yo ca kayasakkhi, yo ca ditthippatto, siya ime tayo puggala …pe…
ps1.5:73.3: annoyeva saddhavimutto, anno kayasakkhi, anno ditthippatto.
ps1.5:74.9: Yo cayam puggalo saddhavimutto, yo ca kayasakkhi, yo ca ditthippatto, evam siya ime tayo puggala saddhavimuttapi kayasakkhipi ditthippattapi vatthuvasena pariyayena.
ps1.5:74.10: Annoyeva saddhavimutto, anno kayasakkhi, anno ditthippatto.
ps1.5:75.1: Aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyam adhimattam hoti, saddhindriyassa adhimattatta sotapattimaggam patilabhati;
ps1.5:75.4: Cattarindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.5:75.5: Saddhindriyassa vasena catunnam indriyanam bhavana hoti.
ps1.5:75.6: Ye hi keci saddhindriyassa vasena sotapattimaggam patilabhanti, sabbe te saddhanusarino.
ps1.5:76.1: Aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyam adhimattam hoti, saddhindriyassa adhimattatta sotapattiphalam sacchikatam hoti;
ps1.5:76.4: Cattarindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.5:76.5: Saddhindriyassa vasena cattarindriyani bhavitani honti subhavitani.
ps1.5:76.6: Yehi keci saddhindriyassa vasena sotapattiphalam sacchikata, sabbe te saddhavimutta.
ps1.5:77.1: Aniccato manasikaroto saddhindriyam adhimattam hoti, saddhindriyassa adhimattatta sakadagamimaggam patilabhati …pe…
ps1.5:77.11: Saddhindriyassa vasena cattarindriyani bhavitani honti subhavitani.
ps1.5:77.12: Yehi keci saddhindriyassa vasena arahattam sacchikata, sabbe te saddhavimutta.
ps1.5:78.1: Dukkhato manasikaroto samadhindriyam adhimattam hoti, samadhindriyassa adhimattatta sotapattimaggam patilabhati;
ps1.5:78.4: Cattarindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.5:78.5: Samadhindriyassa vasena catunnam indriyanam bhavana hoti.
ps1.5:78.6: Ye hi keci samadhindriyassa vasena sotapattimaggam patilabhanti, sabbe te kayasakkhi.
ps1.5:79.1: Dukkhato manasikaroto samadhindriyam adhimattam hoti, samadhindriyassa adhimattatta sotapattiphalam sacchikatam hoti …pe…
ps1.5:79.10: Cattarindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.5:79.11: Samadhindriyassa vasena cattarindriyani bhavitani honti subhavitani.
ps1.5:79.12: Ye hi keci samadhindriyassa vasena arahattam sacchikata, sabbe te kayasakkhi.
ps1.5:80.1: Anattato manasikaroto pannindriyam adhimattam hoti, pannindriyassa adhimattatta sotapattimaggam patilabhati;
ps1.5:80.6: Pannindriyassa vasena catunnam indriyanam bhavana hoti.
ps1.5:80.7: Ye hi keci pannindriyassa vasena sotapattimaggam patilabhanti, sabbe te dhammanusarino.
ps1.5:81.1: Anattato manasikaroto pannindriyam adhimattam hoti, pannindriyassa adhimattatta sotapattiphalam sacchikatam hoti;
ps1.5:81.6: Pannindriyassa vasena cattarindriyani bhavitani honti subhavitani.
ps1.5:81.7: Ye hi keci pannindriyassa vasena sotapattiphalam sacchikata, sabbe te ditthippatta.
ps1.5:82.1: Anattato manasikaroto pannindriyam adhimattam hoti, pannindriyassa adhimattatta sakadagamimaggam patilabhati …pe…
ps1.5:82.9: Cattarindriyani tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti.
ps1.5:82.10: Pannindriyassa vasena cattarindriyani bhavitani honti subhavitani.
ps1.5:82.11: Ye hi keci pannindriyassa vasena arahattam sacchikata, sabbe te ditthippatta.
ps1.5:83.1: Ye hi keci nekkhammam bhavita va bhaventi va bhavissanti va, adhigata va adhigacchanti va adhigamissanti va, patta va papunanti va papunissanti va, patiladdha va patilabhanti va patilabhissanti va, patividdha va pativijjhanti va pativijjhissanti va, sacchikata va sacchikaronti va sacchikarissanti va, phassita va phassanti va phassissanti va, vasippatta va papunanti va papunissanti va, paramippatta va papunanti va papunissanti va, vesarajjappatta va papunanti va papunissanti va, sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhavimutta, samadhindriyassa vasena kayasakkhi, pannindriyassa vasena ditthippatta.
ps1.5:85.8: ye hi keci attha vimokkhe bhavita va bhaventi va bhavissanti va, adhigata va adhigacchanti va adhigamissanti va, patta va papunanti va papunissanti va, patiladdha va patilabhanti va patilabhissanti va, patividdha va pativijjhanti va pativijjhissanti va, sacchikata va sacchikaronti va sacchikarissanti va, phassita va phassanti va phassissanti va, vasippatta va papunanti va papunissanti va paramippatta va papunanti va papunissanti va, vesarajjappatta va papunanti va papunissanti va, sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhavimutta, samadhindriyassa vasena kayasakkhi, pannindriyassa vasena ditthippatta.
ps1.5:86.1: Ye hi keci catasso patisambhida patta va papunanti va papunissanti va …pe…
ps1.5:86.2: sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhavimutta, samadhindriyassa vasena kayasakkhi, pannindriyassa vasena ditthippatta.
ps1.5:87.1: Ye hi keci tisso vijja patividdha va pativijjhanti va pativijjhissanti va …pe…
ps1.5:87.2: sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhavimutta, samadhindriyassa vasena kayasakkhi, pannindriyassa vasena ditthippatta.
ps1.5:88.1: Ye hi keci tisso sikkha sikkhita va sikkhanti va sikkhissanti va, sacchikata va sacchikaronti va sacchikarissanti va, phassita va phassanti va phassissanti va, vasippatta va papunanti va papunissanti va, paramippatta va papunanti va papunissanti va, vesarajjappatta va papunanti va papunissanti va, sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhavimutta, samadhindriyassa vasena kayasakkhi, pannindriyassa vasena ditthippatta.
ps1.5:89.1: Ye hi keci dukkham parijananti samudayam pajahanti nirodham sacchikaronti maggam bhaventi, sabbe te saddhindriyassa vasena saddhavimutta, samadhindriyassa vasena kayasakkhi, pannindriyassa vasena ditthippatta.
ps1.5:90.5: Dukkhasaccam parinnapativedham pativijjhati, samudayasaccam pahanappativedham pativijjhati, nirodhasaccam sacchikiriyapativedham pativijjhati, maggasaccam bhavanapativedham pativijjhati.
ps1.5:90.7: Imehi catuhakarehi saccani pativijjhanto saddhindriyassa vasena saddhavimutto, samadhindriyassa vasena kayasakkhi, pannindriyassa vasena ditthippatto.
ps1.5:91.3: Navahakarehi saccappativedho hoti, navahakarehi saccani pativijjhati.
ps1.5:91.4: Dukkhasaccam parinnapativedham pativijjhati, samudayasaccam pahanappativedham pativijjhati, nirodhasaccam sacchikiriyapativedham pativijjhati, maggasaccam bhavanapativedham pativijjhati.
ps1.5:91.5: Abhinnapativedho ca sabbadhammanam, parinnapativedho ca sabbasankharanam, pahanappativedho ca sabbakusalanam, bhavanapativedho ca catunnam magganam, sacchikiriyapativedho ca nirodhassa.
ps1.5:91.7: Imehi navahakarehi saccani pativijjhanto saddhindriyassa vasena saddhavimutto, samadhindriyassa vasena kayasakkhi, pannindriyassa vasena ditthippatto.
ps1.5:93.1: Aniccato manasikaroto kim bahulam cittam hoti?
ps1.5:93.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto kim bahulam cittam hoti?
ps1.5:93.3: Anattato manasikaroto kim bahulam cittam hoti?
ps1.5:94.1: Aniccato manasikaronto adhimokkhabahulo katamam vimokkham patilabhati?
ps1.5:94.2: Dukkhato manasikaronto passaddhibahulo katamam vimokkham patilabhati?
ps1.5:94.3: Anattato manasikaronto vedabahulo katamam vimokkham patilabhati?
ps1.5:94.4: Aniccato manasikaronto adhimokkhabahulo animittam vimokkham patilabhati.
ps1.5:94.5: Dukkhato manasikaronto passaddhibahulo appanihitam vimokkham patilabhati.
ps1.5:94.6: Anattato manasikaronto vedabahulo sunnatam vimokkham patilabhati.
ps1.5:95.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa katamo vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, bhavanaya kati vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, kenatthena bhavana, ko bhaveti?
ps1.5:95.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa katamo vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, bhavanaya kati vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, kenatthena bhavana, ko bhaveti?
ps1.5:95.3: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa katamo vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, bhavanaya kati vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, kenatthena bhavana, ko bhaveti?
ps1.5:96.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa animitto vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:96.2: Bhavanaya dve vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti.
ps1.5:96.6: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa appanihito vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:96.7: Bhavanaya dve vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti.
ps1.5:96.11: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa sunnato vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:96.12: Bhavanaya dve vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti.
ps1.5:97.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa katamo vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, bhavanaya kati vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, pativedhakale katamo vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, pativedhaya kati vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, kenatthena bhavana, kenatthena pativedho?
ps1.5:97.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa katamo vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, bhavanaya kati vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, pativedhakale katamo vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, pativedhaya kati vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, kenatthena bhavana, kenatthena pativedho?
ps1.5:97.3: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa katamo vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, bhavanaya kati vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, pativedhakale katamo vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, pativedhaya kativimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, kenatthena bhavana, kenatthena pativedho?
ps1.5:98.1: Aniccato manasikaroto adhimokkhabahulassa animitto vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, bhavanaya dve vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, pativedhakalepi animitto vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, pativedhaya dve vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, ekarasatthena bhavana, dassanatthena pativedho, evam pativijjhantopi bhaveti, bhaventopi pativijjhati.
ps1.5:98.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto passaddhibahulassa appanihito vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, bhavanaya dve vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, pativedhakalepi appanihito vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, pativedhaya dve vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, ekarasatthena bhavana, dassanatthena pativedho, evam pativijjhantopi bhaveti, bhaventopi pativijjhati.
ps1.5:98.3: Anattato manasikaroto vedabahulassa sunnato vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, bhavanaya dve vimokkha tadanvaya honti sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, pativedhakalepi sunnato vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, pativedhaya dve vimokkha tadanvaya honti, sahajatapaccaya honti, annamannapaccaya honti, nissayapaccaya honti, sampayuttapaccaya honti, ekarasa honti, ekarasatthena bhavana, dassanatthena pativedho, evam pativijjhantopi bhaveti, bhaventopi pativijjhati.
ps1.5:99.1: Aniccato manasikaroto katamo vimokkho adhimatto hoti?
ps1.5:99.3: Dukkhato manasikaroto katamo vimokkho adhimatto hoti?
ps1.5:99.5: Anattato manasikaroto katamo vimokkho adhimatto hoti?
ps1.5:100.1: Aniccato manasikaroto animitto vimokkho adhimatto hoti.
ps1.5:100.3: Dukkhato manasikaroto appanihito vimokkho adhimatto hoti.
ps1.5:100.5: Anattato manasikaroto sunnato vimokkho adhimatto hoti.
ps1.5:101.9: Jhanaphassam pathamam phusati, paccha nirodham nibbanam sacchikarotiti—
ps1.5:101.11: “Dukkha sankhara, sukho nirodho”ti vinnatam hoti dittham viditam sacchikatam phassitam pannayati—
ps1.5:101.13: ye hi keci nekkhammam bhavita va bhaventi va bhavissanti va …pe…
ps1.5:101.14: sabbe te animittavimokkhassa vasena saddhavimutta, appanihitavimokkhassa vasena kayasakkhi, sunnatavimokkhassa vasena ditthippatta.
ps1.5:102.4: ye hi keci dukkham parijananti, samudayam pajahanti, nirodham sacchikaronti, maggam bhaventi, sabbe te animittavimokkhassa vasena saddhavimutta, appanihitavimokkhassa vasena kayasakkhi, sunnatavimokkhassa vasena ditthippatta.
ps1.5:103.5: Dukkhasaccam parinnapativedham pativijjhati, samudayasaccam pahanapativedham pativijjhati.
ps1.5:103.9: Imehi catuhakarehi saccani pativijjhanto animittavimokkhassa vasena saddhavimutto, appanihitavimokkhassa vasena kayasakkhi, sunnatavimokkhassa vasena ditthippatto.
ps1.5:104.8: Imehi navahakarehi saccani pativijjhanto animittavimokkhassa vasena saddhavimutto, appanihitavimokkhassa vasena kayasakkhi, sunnatavimokkhassa vasena ditthippatto.
ps1.5:105.1: Aniccato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathabhutam janati passati?
ps1.5:105.3: Katham tadanvayena sabbe sankhara aniccato sudittha honti?
ps1.5:105.5: Dukkhato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathabhutam janati passati?
ps1.5:105.7: Katham tadanvayena sabbe sankhara dukkhato sudittha honti?
ps1.5:105.9: Anattato manasikaronto katame dhamme yathabhutam janati passati?
ps1.5:105.11: Katham tadanvayena sabbe dhamma anattato sudittha honti?
ps1.5:106.1: Aniccato manasikaronto nimittam yathabhutam janati passati;
ps1.5:106.4: Evam tadanvayena sabbe sankhara aniccato sudittha honti.
ps1.5:106.6: Dukkhato manasikaronto pavattam yathabhutam janati passati;
ps1.5:106.9: Evam tadanvayena sabbe sankhara dukkhato sudittha honti.
ps1.5:106.11: Anattato manasikaronto nimittanca pavattanca yathabhutam janati passati;
ps1.5:106.14: Evam tadanvayena sabbe dhamma anattato sudittha honti.
ps1.5:107.1: Yanca yathabhutam nanam yanca sammadassanam ya ca kankhavitarana, ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca, udahu ekattha, byanjanameva nananti?
ps1.5:107.2: Yanca yathabhutam nanam yanca sammadassanam ya ca kankhavitarana, ime dhamma ekattha, byanjanameva nanam.
ps1.5:108.6: Anattato manasikaroto nimittanca pavattanca bhayato upatthati.
ps1.5:109.1: Ya ca bhayatupatthane panna yanca adinave nanam ya ca nibbida, ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca, udahu ekattha, byanjanameva nananti?
ps1.5:109.2: Ya ca bhayatupatthane panna yanca adinave nanam ya ca nibbida, ime dhamma ekattha, byanjanameva nanam.
ps1.5:110.1: Ya ca anattanupassana ya ca sunnatanupassana, ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca, udahu ekattha, byanjanameva nananti?
ps1.5:110.2: Ya ca anattanupassana ya ca sunnatanupassana, ime dhamma ekattha, byanjanameva nanam.
ps1.5:111.1: Aniccato manasikaroto kim patisankha nanam uppajjati?
ps1.5:111.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto kim patisankha nanam uppajjati?
ps1.5:111.3: Anattato manasikaroto kim patisankha nanam uppajjati?
ps1.5:111.4: Aniccato manasikaroto nimittam patisankha nanam uppajjati.
ps1.5:111.5: Dukkhato manasikaroto pavattam patisankha nanam uppajjati.
ps1.5:111.6: Anattato manasikaroto nimittanca pavattanca patisankha nanam uppajjati.
ps1.5:112.1: Ya ca muccitukamyata ya ca patisankhanupassana ya ca sankharupekkha, ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca, udahu ekattha, byanjanameva nananti?
ps1.5:112.2: Ya ca muccitukamyata ya ca patisankhanupassana ya ca sankharupekkha, ime dhamma ekattha, byanjanameva nanam.
ps1.5:113.1: Aniccato manasikaroto kuto cittam vutthati, kattha cittam pakkhandati?
ps1.5:113.2: Dukkhato manasikaroto kuto cittam vutthati, kattha cittam pakkhandati?
ps1.5:113.3: Anattato manasikaroto kuto cittam vutthati, kattha cittam pakkhandati?
ps1.5:113.4: Aniccato manasikaroto nimitta cittam vutthati, animitte cittam pakkhandati.
ps1.5:113.5: Dukkhato manasikaroto pavatta cittam vutthati, appavatte cittam pakkhandati.
ps1.5:113.6: Anattato manasikaroto nimitta ca pavatta ca cittam vutthati, animitte appavatte nirodhe nibbanadhatuya cittam pakkhandati.
ps1.5:114.1: Ya ca bahiddhavutthanavivattane panna ye ca gotrabhu dhamma, ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca, udahu ekattha, byanjanameva nananti?
ps1.5:114.2: Ya ca bahiddhavutthanavivattane panna ye ca gotrabhu dhamma, ime dhamma ekattha, byanjanameva nanam.
ps1.5:116.1: Ya ca dubhato vutthanavivattane panna yanca magge nanam, ime dhamma nanattha ceva nanabyanjana ca, udahu ekattha, byanjanameva nananti?
ps1.5:116.2: Ya ca dubhato vutthanavivattane panna yanca magge nanam, ime dhamma ekattha, byanjanameva nanam.
ps1.5:118.1: Katamehi catuhakarehi tayo vimokkha nanakkhane honti?
ps1.5:118.3: Katham adhipateyyatthena tayo vimokkha nanakkhane honti?
ps1.5:118.4: Aniccato manasikaroto animitto vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, dukkhato manasikaroto appanihito vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti, anattato manasikaroto sunnato vimokkho adhipateyyo hoti.
ps1.5:118.5: Evam adhipateyyatthena tayo vimokkha nanakkhane honti.
ps1.5:119.1: Katham adhitthanatthena tayo vimokkha nanakkhane honti?
ps1.5:119.2: Aniccato manasikaronto animittavimokkhassa vasena cittam adhitthati, dukkhato manasikaronto appanihitavimokkhassa vasena cittam adhitthati, anattato manasikaronto sunnatavimokkhassa vasena cittam adhitthati.
ps1.5:119.3: Evam adhitthanatthena tayo vimokkha nanakkhane honti.
ps1.5:120.1: Katham abhiniharatthena tayo vimokkha nanakkhane honti?
ps1.5:120.2: Aniccato manasikaronto animittavimokkhassa vasena cittam abhiniharati, dukkhato manasikaronto appanihitavimokkhassa vasena cittam abhiniharati, anattato manasikaronto sunnatavimokkhassa vasena cittam abhiniharati.
ps1.5:120.3: Evam abhiniharatthena tayo vimokkha nanakkhane honti.
ps1.5:121.1: Katham niyyanatthena tayo vimokkha nanakkhane honti?
ps1.5:121.2: Aniccato manasikaronto animittavimokkhassa vasena nirodham nibbanam niyyati, dukkhato manasikaronto appanihitavimokkhassa vasena nirodham nibbanam niyyati, anattato manasikaronto sunnatavimokkhassa vasena nirodham nibbanam niyyati.
ps1.5:121.3: Evam niyyanatthena tayo vimokkha nanakkhane honti.
ps1.5:121.4: Imehi catuhakarehi tayo vimokkha nanakkhane honti.
ps1.5:122.1: Katamehi sattahakarehi tayo vimokkha ekakkhane honti?
ps1.5:122.2: Samodhanatthena, adhigamanatthena, patilabhatthena pativedhatthena, sacchikiriyatthena, phassanatthena, abhisamayatthena.
ps1.5:122.3: Katham samodhanatthena adhigamanatthena patilabhatthena pativedhatthena sacchikiriyatthena phassanatthena abhisamayatthena tayo vimokkha ekakkhane honti?
ps1.5:122.12: Evam samodhanatthena adhigamanatthena patilabhatthena pativedhatthena sacchikiriyatthena phassanatthena abhisamayatthena tayo vimokkha ekakkhane honti.
ps1.5:123.7: Yena nimittena animitto, tattha na panidahatiti—
ps1.5:123.9: Evam samodhanatthena adhigamanatthena patilabhatthena pativedhatthena sacchikiriyatthena phassanatthena abhisamayatthena tayo vimokkha ekakkhane honti.
ps1.5:124.5: Yena nimittena animitto, tattha na panidahatiti—
ps1.5:124.9: Evam samodhanatthena adhigamanatthena patilabhatthena pativedhatthena sacchikiriyatthena phassanatthena abhisamayatthena tayo vimokkha ekakkhane honti.
ps1.5:124.10: Imehi sattahakarehi tayo vimokkha ekakkhane honti.
ps1.5:125.1: Atthi vimokkho, atthi mukham, atthi vimokkhamukham, atthi vimokkhapaccanikam, atthi vimokkhanulomam, atthi vimokkhavivatto, atthi vimokkhabhavana, atthi vimokkhappatippassaddhi.
ps1.5:126.2: Sunnato vimokkho, animitto vimokkho, appanihito vimokkho.
ps1.5:132.2: Ye tattha jata anavajjakusala bodhipakkhiya dhamma, idam mukham.
ps1.5:133.2: Yam tesam dhammanam arammanam nirodho nibbanam, idam vimokkhamukham.
ps1.5:134.2: Tini akusalamulani vimokkhapaccanikani, tini duccaritani vimokkhapaccanikani, sabbepi akusala dhamma vimokkhapaccanika, idam vimokkhapaccanikam.
ps1.5:135.2: Tini kusalamulani vimokkhanulomani, tini sucaritani vimokkhanulomani, sabbepi kusala dhamma vimokkhanuloma, idam vimokkhanulomam.
ps1.5:136.2: Sannavivatto, cetovivatto, cittavivatto, nanavivatto, vimokkhavivatto, saccavivatto.
ps1.5:137.1: Yattha sannavivatto tattha cetovivatto, yattha cetovivatto tattha sannavivatto, yattha sannavivatto cetovivatto tattha cittavivatto, yattha cittavivatto tattha sannavivatto cetovivatto.
ps1.5:137.2: Yattha sannavivatto cetovivatto cittavivatto tattha nanavivatto, yattha nanavivatto tattha sannavivatto cetovivatto cittavivatto.
ps1.5:137.3: Yattha sannavivatto cetovivatto cittavivatto nanavivatto tattha vimokkhavivatto, yattha vimokkhavivatto tattha sannavivatto cetovivatto cittavivatto nanavivatto.
ps1.5:137.4: Yattha sannavivatto cetovivatto cittavivatto nanavivatto vimokkhavivatto tattha saccavivatto, yattha saccavivatto tattha sannavivatto cetovivatto cittavivatto nanavivatto vimokkhavivatto.
ps1.5:138.2: Pathamassa jhanassa asevana bhavana bahulikammam, dutiyassa jhanassa asevana bhavana bahulikammam, tatiyassa jhanassa asevana bhavana bahulikammam, catutthassa jhanassa asevana bhavana bahulikammam, akasanancayatanasamapattiya asevana bhavana bahulikammam, vinnanancayatanasamapattiya …pe…
ps1.5:138.4: nevasannanasannayatanasamapattiya asevana bhavana bahulikammam, sotapattimaggassa asevana bhavana bahulikammam, sakadagamimaggassa asevana bhavana bahulikammam, anagamimaggassa asevana bhavana bahulikammam, arahattamaggassa asevana bhavana bahulikammam, ayam vimokkhabhavana.
ps1.5:139.2: Pathamassa jhanassa patilabho va vipako va, dutiyassa jhanassa patilabho va vipako va, tatiyassa jhanassa …pe…
ps1.5:139.7: nevasannanasannayatanasamapattiya patilabho va vipako va, sotapattimaggassa sotapattiphalam, sakadagamimaggassa sakadagamiphalam, anagamimaggassa anagamiphalam, arahattamaggassa arahattaphalam, ayam vimokkhappatippassaddhiti.
